title: SOLD:  1926-29 Exhibits JIMMIE FOXX  Rookie RC SGC 2  SOLD!!!
author: rickalaska

posts.post_title: SOLD:  1926-29 Exhibits JIMMIE FOXX  Rookie RC SGC 2  SOLD!!!
posts.post_content:
SOLD - Jimmie Foxx Rookie card SGC 2 

Slightly rarer than the 1925 Exhibits  LOU GEHRIG  Rookie 

Gehrig:  78 total PSA & SGC

Foxx:  77 total PSA & SGC

It was only about 15 years ago that the Gehrig rookie was selling in this range...  Today, SMR lists a Gehrig in grade 2 at $32,500+

Jimmie Foxx was the second man to hit 500 homers, behind Babe Ruth.  He had a .325 lifetime batting average, won two batting titles, 1922 RBIs, two World Series, and was MVP three times
